text: Onezi, koito Go sŭdruzhavat, shte kazhat: “Ako pozhelaeshe Allakh, nyamashe da sŭdruzhim nito nie, nito nashite bashti, i nyamashe da vŭzbranim nishto.” Taka otrichakha i onezi predi tyakh, dokato vkusikha Nasheto mŭchenie. Kazhi: “Imate li znanie, ta da go izyavite pred nas? Vie sledvate edinstveno dogadkata i samo predpolagate.”
